headerDisplay: ⚠️ For the best experience, follow the recommendations.
footerDisplay:
Recommendations
  1. run this plugin in an isolated child bridge because the SMA Home Manager broadcasts energy flow updates every second!
  2. place this plugin's accessories in an "Energy" or "Electricity" room in, in a "Utilities" zone (you can put a "Climate" room in this zone too, for ventilation, heating and cooling).
  3. Use the Eve, Home+ or Controller app to create energy-related automations (Apple's Home app does not support this).

ip_inverter.title: SMA Inverter IP
ip_inverter.description: The ip address of you SMA inverter (Tri-Power, Sunny Boy, …)

offGrid.title: Off Grid
offGrid.description: When 0 W is imported from the grid for the past minute.

noSun.title: No Sun
noSun.description: When 0 W is produced during the past 15 minutes.

highImport.title: High Grid Import
highImport.description:
When the 15 minute mean import is >2500 W. Some distribution network operators charge extra to reduce peak load on their infrastructure. Use this signal to apply peak load shaving.
For example "demand tariff or capacity charge" in Australia (30 min window during peak hours), "capacity tariff" in Belgium (≥ 2.5 kW in any 15 min window).

surplusSignals.title: PV Surplus Signals
surplusSignals.description:
Avoid exporting solar energy to the grid: consume it yourself, whenever the necessary surplus is available!
Note: order matters: the surplus signals will be evaluated from first to last.
